comment.author: 62508825@N00
comment._content: John James (Jack) Dwyer 9 March 1890 – 17 January 1962. See en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Dwyer_%28VC%29 for additional information, c1918 photo and c1931 photo. Fuller biography and information about family here adb.anu.edu.au/biography/dwyer-john-james-jack-10081 See www.parliament.tas.gov.au/history/tasparl/dwyerj414.htm for positions in the Tasmanian Parliament.

comment.author: 62508825@N00
comment._content: Sergeant John James Dwyer appears in three different studio portraits and a group photograph at the National Library of Australia website www.pictureaustralia.org/apps/pictureaustralia?term1=serg...

comment.author: 63145171@N02
comment._content: He's my great grand father. What a legend!

comment.author: 32300107@N06
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/paul-hutchins] Definitely a legend. If you have any info, photos - or even family anecdotes - it would be great to see them. Thanks.
